availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Henry Woodward (Franklin County, Kentucky farm laborer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farm laborer. Anderson County, Kentucky native. Son of Elliott Woodard and Lucy Patterson Woodard. Working as a laborer in Franklin County in 1860 and 1870.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 211A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 371
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Benson, p. 34A
